name: Welcome to PASV!
instruction:
Write a function `greeting` that takes an argument `name` and returns the string `Hello, name! Welcome to PASV! Set the default value for the `name` argument to `friend`.

Examples
```javascript
greeting('Alice'); // 'Hello, Alice! Welcome to PASV!
Greeting('Bob'); // 'Hello, Bob! Welcome to PASV!
greeting(); // 'Hello, friend! Welcome to PASV!'
```
